raw_comment:
I notice India and and the United States power usage has not increased nearly as much as China's has. At one point it even decreased a little bit.
I wonder why Indias main power source is coal? 
This relates to my community because my community is close to wind power and oil/gas producers. 
Catchy headline: "Populations Powers"
ace_sentences: I notice that the power usage in India has not increased nearly as much as the power usage in China.
I notice that the power usage in the United States has not increased nearly as much as the power usage in China.
At one point, the power usage in India decreased a little bit.
I wonder why the main power source in India is coal.
This comment relates to my community.
My community is close to wind power producers.
My community is close to oil and gas producers.
